ValidationRule.description: Rule that prevents other AEs and ADRs from updating a transfer log.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Owner:User.Id!=$User.Id , AE_Demo_Transfer_To__r.Id!=$User.Id, $UserRole.Name!="Management", $UserRole.Name!="Operations", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator API", Not($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), Not($Setup.Global_Automation_Settings__c.Skip_Validation_Rule__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must be the transferring ADR or recipient AE to update this transfer log. Please reach out to Sales Ops if you require assistance.
